dl.dd: Type: one of the values below

Indicates how the menu width and the template.XULElem("menupopup") width are determined. If the sizetopopup attribute is left out or set to none, the menu will be its preferred width and the popup may extend outside of this width, unaffected by the maximum width of the menu itself.
The width of the popup will not be constrained to the size of the menu.
If set to always, the menu's width will be the same as that necessary for the template.XULElem("menupopup"). If the menu has a maximum width, the popup will also be this width.
